name: Cosmic Pulse: An Audio-Reactive Galaxy
description: A beautiful 3D galaxy visualization that subtly reacts to ambient audio from the microphone. The color and intensity of the galaxy and its surrounding space change with sound, creating an immersive cosmic experience.
prompt: Replace the current guideform with a dynamic 3D galaxy visualization. The galaxy should have rotating spiral arms and emit a soft glow. Its color and intensity should subtly react to ambient audio input, creating a more immersive cosmic experience.
